channel.title: Gauging Interest in C Array Series
channel.description:
Hey everyone!
A lot of people look at C's arrays and see boundless limitation. Static size? Ew. SegFaults left and right? Oh god. How will I get anything done?
Well, I thought I could help out by writing a few short little tutorials on dynamic arrays in C.
[poll] - I'd be down to see this series. - Thanks, but no thanks. [/poll]

item.title: Gauging Interest in C Array Series
item.dc:creator: oaktree
item.description:
LOL @Nitrax. I guess you might not be one to need the series, eh?

Read full topic
item.source: Gauging Interest in C Array Series
